author: GameSpot
description:
Kurt and Lucy go through the 2025 Game Award categories and add a games they would have like to see nominated such as Look Outside, Keeper, Atomfall, and more.

Watch the full Kurt & Lucy Gotcha Covered Episode: https://youtu.be/dTnc_mym-qA

Timestamps: 
00:00 - Intro
00:24 - Most Anticipated Game
02:53 - Best RPG
03:26 - Best Action Adventure
04:16 - Best Indie Game Debut
05:18 - Best Independent Game
07:15 - Best Performance
08:27 - Best Score And Music
09:30 - Best Art Direction
09:58 - Best Narrative
11:16 - Best Game Direction
11:37 - Game Of The Year

Credits: Lucy James, Kurt Indovina, Jean-Luc Seipke

#gamespot #gaming
title: These Games Were Missing From The Game Awards Nominations
